text: The 2015 Canadian Senior Curling Championships was held from March 21 to 28 at the Thistle Curling Club in Edmonton, Alberta. The winners represented Canada at the 2016 World Senior Curling Championships. ==Men== ===Teams=== The teams are listed as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Province !! Skip !! Third !! Second !! Lead !!
